Tunable.name: SPAWN_ON_GROUND_FGL_HEIGHT_TOLERANCE
Tunable.display: Spawn On Ground Fgl Height Tolerance
Tunable.description: Maximum height tolerance on the terrain we will use for the placement of the spawned object. If the spawned objects have interactions on them, this value will generate a height difference between the object and the sim. Because of this if this value changes all animations on spawned objects should be verified. Include a GPE and an Animator when making changes to this value.

Tunable.name: GROUND_SPAWNER_DECAY_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: Commodity which will trigger the ground spawner of an object on decay.

Tunable.name: SLOT_SPAWNER_DECAY_COMMODITY
Tunable.description: Commodity which will trigger the slot spawner of an object on decay.

Tunable.name: SPAWNER_COMMODITY_RESET_VARIANCE
Tunable.description: Max variance to apply when the spawn commodity is being reset to its threshold value. This is meant to add some randomness on how spawners will create objects. e.g. After a spawner creates an objects its spawn statistic will go back to 100-RandomValue from 0 to Variance this way it wont always start at the same time

Tunable.name: SPAWN_DELAYED_END
Tunable.description: This is the maximum amount of sim minutes we wait before we start spawning objects for the first time in the zone at SPAWN_FREQUENCY. We pick a random time between the start and end delayed time.

Tunable.name: SPAWN_DELAYED_START
Tunable.description: This is the minimum amount of sim minutes we wait before we start spawning objects for the first time in the zone at SPAWN_FREQUENCY. We pick a random time between the start and end delayed time.

Tunable.name: SPAWN_FREQUENCY
Tunable.description: This is the frequency at which the spawner components spawn the individual objects for the first time you are playing in the zone. Please talk with a GPE about performance concerns if you tune this value.
